welcome_message_body: Welcome to Embrun, the charming city known for its breathtaking natural landscapes and friendly locals! We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport, primarily used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Gatineau-Ottawa Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
